Class GUIFrame

java.lang.Object
  GUIFrame
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
public class GUIFrame
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener

GUIFrame - Java-1.2/Swing based GUI for simulator MiniSim. See the MiniSim description for more info. Written by Andy Ganse, Applied Physics Lab, University of Washington, copyright 1999 by UW.

See Also:
MiniSim
